biography.bio: Jean Yonnel was born on July 21, 1891 in Bucharest, Romania. He was an actor, known for The Call (1936), Amok (1934) and Heaven Sent (1963). He died on August 17, 1968 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Jean Yonnel

biography.bio: Pierre de Guingand was born on June 6, 1885 in Paris, France as Octave Pierre Deguigand. He was an actor, known for The Call (1936), I Kiss Your Hand Madame (1929) and Le roi de la vitesse (1924). He died on June 10, 1964 in Versailles, France.
biography.name: Pierre de Guingand

biography.bio: Jacqueline Francell was born on March 23, 1908 in Paris, France. She was an actress, known for Enlevez-moi (1932), La rose effeuillée (1937) and Mirages de Paris (1933). She died in 1962.
biography.name: Jacqueline Francell

biography.bio: Alice Tissot was born on January 1, 1890 in Paris, Ile-de-France, France as Alice Claire Marie Tissot. She was an actress, known for The Horse Ate the Hat (1928), La maternelle (1933) and Le récit du colonel (1907). She died on May 5, 1971 in Paris.
biography.name: Alice Tissot

biography.bio: Suzanne Bianchetti was born on February 24, 1889 in Paris, France. She was an actress, known for Napoleon (1927), L'heureuse mort (1925) and The Prince of Adventurers (1927). She was married to René Jeanne. She died on October 17, 1936 in Paris.
biography.name: Suzanne Bianchetti

biography.bio: Pierre Juvenet was born on May 9, 1883 in Lyon, Rhône, France. He was an actor, known for L'argent (1928), Allô... Allô... (1931) and The Pearls of the Crown (1937). He died in 1951.
biography.name: Pierre Juvenet

biography.bio: Thomy Bourdelle was born on April 20, 1891 in Paris, France as Thomy Charles Bourdel. He was an actor and production manager, known for The Last Will of Dr. Mabuse (1933), Sous les toits de Paris (1930) and The Return of Don Camillo (1953). He died on June 27, 1972 in Toulon, Var, France.
biography.name: Thomy Bourdelle

biography.bio: André Nox was born on November 14, 1869 in Paris, France as André Nonnez. He was an actor and writer, known for The Life and Loves of Beethoven (1936), La mort du soleil (1922) and Vertige (1917). He died on February 25, 1946 in Fouesnant, Finistère, France.
biography.name: André Nox

biography.bio: Pierre Nay was born on November 6, 1898 in Paris, France as Pierre Lucien Nonnes-Lopez. He was an actor, known for The Rules of the Game (1939), Those of the Viking (1932) and La Marseillaise (1938). He died on August 17, 1978 in Quimper, Finistère, France.
biography.name: Pierre Nay

biography.bio: Fred Pasquali was born on October 31, 1898 in Constantinople, Ottoman Empire. He is known for his work on My Wife as a Businessman (1932), Fernandel the Dressmaker (1956) and Un nom qui rapporte (1933). He was married to Jeannette Papir. He died on June 12, 1991 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Fred Pasquali

biography.bio: Auguste Bovério was born on February 21, 1886 in Paris, France as Auguste Louis Boverio. He was an actor, known for Children of Paradise (1945), Forces occultes (1943) and Le dernier tournant (1939). He died on April 11, 1950 in Paris.
biography.name: Auguste Bovério

biography.bio: Alexandre Mihalesco was born on October 19, 1883 in Bucharest, Romania as Alexandru Mihailescu. He was an actor, known for The Passion of Joan of Arc (1928), Marius (1931) and La croix du sud (1932). He died on December 28, 1974 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Alexandre Mihalesco

biography.bio: Fernand Francell was born on November 9, 1879 in Gevrey-Chambertin, Côte-d'Or, France as Fernand Claude Eugène François. He was an actor, known for The Call (1936) and Three Musketeers (1932). He died on February 18, 1966 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Fernand Francell

biography.bio: Jeanne Marie-Laurent was born on September 1, 1877 in Paris, France as Jeanne Micheline Marie Quillevere. She was an actress, known for Mother (1925), Verdun, visions d'histoire (1928) and Miracle of a Necklace (1909). She died on April 7, 1964 in Lagny-sur-Marne, Seine-et-Marne, France.
biography.name: Jeanne Marie-Laurent

biography.bio: Georges Cahuzac was born on February 10, 1871 in Sénouillac, Tarn, France as Georges Séverin Cahuzac. He was an actor, known for Napoleon (1927), Madame Bovary (1934) and The Elusive Robber (1910). He died on February 26, 1956 in Eaubonne, Val-d'Oise, France.
biography.name: Georges Cahuzac
